query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN matchStarted = 0 AND matchEnded = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as upcoming,
  SUM(CASE WHEN matchStarted = 1 AND matchEnded = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as live,
  SUM(CASE WHEN matchEnded = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed
FROM matches;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2EKhjpwgmHfHvW4.4164de301b73 --database aHKMyW7q8Yzq4ixgg6hEiM --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN matchStarted = 0 AND matchEnded = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as upcoming,
  SUM(CASE WHEN matchStarted = 1 AND matchEnded = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as live,
  SUM(CASE WHEN matchEnded = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed
FROM matches;
